name: Adagio
overview:
Adagio is a mobile and online marketing agency serving Europe, North America and Asia. It is specialized in performance driven advertising made possible through its own advertising network, own media and user databases.

Adagio has three major divisions: mobile, online and development

The mobile part features next to performance based mobile advertising also geolocation services and mobile VAS. The online part covers also performance based advertising and social media advertising. As a supportive factor to the above, the development part is there to build anything needed for the campaign, such as apps, mobile websites or flash games.

Adagio works for a divers portfolio of clients in various countries, such as independent merchants, e-service providers or telcos.
